channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tamariki Haka
channel.desc: Children from kura across the country showcase their haka skills. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mataora Digital
channel.desc: Amazing content curated for rangatahi, wh?nau and pakeke. Made by the Mataora team. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te N?tube Haka
channel.desc: Join Te Haakura and Atareta on the adventure of creating their own kapa haka group. Final preparations are underway, however there are issues with the sound. Will they make the stage or not? (R).

channel.title: ?paki
channel.desc: P?nia Papa uses games, music and activities to teach M?ori. (R).

channel.title: T?ku Reo
channel.desc: Professor John Moorfield's M?ori language course supported by an interactive website. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Fresh 2025
channel.desc: Our favourite flavours of the Pacific are presented in a Fresh Poly-platter in this series dedicated to inspiring Islanders worldwide.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Ao with Moana
channel.desc: Current affairs series that puts a M?ori lens on issues that distinguishes it from other current affairs programmes. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Treaty Road
channel.desc: As the buffalo near extinction, the Plains Indigenous People struggle to survive, but they add a medicine chest clause to Treaty 6 to try to protect their health. The Indian Act is pushed through and undermines any rights enshrined in the treaties.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Monolith
channel.desc: A headstrong journalist whose investigative podcast uncovers a strange artifact, an alien conspiracy, and the lies at the heart of her own story.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Sachies Kitchen
channel.desc: Chef Sachie Nomura travels to the Coromandel to meet local seaweed harvesters AgriSea, the Opito Bay Salt Company and the creators of Awildian Gin. (R).

channel.title: ?paki
channel.desc: P?nia Papa uses games, music and activities to teach M?ori. (R).

channel.title: Whare Takataka
channel.desc: P?p? Tei Nohotima shares waiata and karakia using a range of M?ori tools and movement. (R).

channel.title: Whare Takataka
channel.desc: P?p? Tei Nohotima shares waiata and karakia using a range of M?ori tools and movement. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kori Club
channel.desc: Kori Club is a captivating series for 0-8-year-olds that marries the charm of "The Wiggles" with the magic of Te Ao M?ori. (R).

channel.title: Kori Club

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora Kura Tuatahi
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and educating Kura Tuatahi.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ng? K?tiro O Taranaki
channel.desc: Wai and Mihi collect the eels. Mihi is worried about being late to the feast, but Wai doesn?t care. Wai and Mihi and Nga?ru make their way back to the village but come across a dead huia. They don?t notice a piece of bread that has been nibbled by the bird. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ng? K?tiro O Taranaki
channel.desc: Mihi is worried about missing out on delicious Kumara! Wai starts to feel uneasy as if something is wrong. She asks Mihi if she can hear drumming. Suddenly, the Farmers appear! The girls hide and watch as they leave the village. It's too early for the feast to be finished. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Huhu - Te Tunga R?kau
channel.desc: Huhu is a show for preschoolders, featuring reo M?ori stories and highlighting M?ori perspectives. 6 tapes.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Huhu - Te Tunga R?kau
channel.desc: Huhu is a show for preschoolders, featuring reo M?ori stories and highlighting M?ori perspectives. 6 tapes.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: Kura is furious that they have lost the godstick again and tries her best to stop her sister and Josh from making a deal with Hikuroa. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: After crashing down into a valley of lava streams, Kura is determined to find a way back up the cliff and get their godstick back from. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: After a narrow escape, Kura realises she has no choice and sets off to find a way through the treacherous lava streams towards the misty maunga. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara
channel.desc: Tai and her superhuman wh?nau run their local vege shop from their k?mara farm. Tai and Nan are approached by Grace who offers to buy the farm. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara
channel.desc: Tai and her superhuman wh?nau run their local vege shop from their k?mara farm. Nan falls sick so Marama and N?kau return to look after Tai and the farm. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara
channel.desc: Tai and her superhuman wh?nau run their local vege shop from their k?mara farm. Tai and Amaia devise a plan to bust Nan out of hospital. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: West Coasters
channel.desc: The enduring struggle for pounamu has shaped the narrative of West Coast M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: NEW: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: 1.5 Degrees
channel.desc: Exploring the impact of climate change from the perspective of Rangatahi M?ori. Pania wants to share her passion for environmental justice and inspire other rangatahi to take action. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kids Dont Come With A Manual
channel.desc: Sarah and Alexi struggle with their 3 year old daughter whose screaming is causing distress within the wh?nau. They are also looking for ways to stay connected to their eldest son. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Ao with Moana
channel.desc: NEW: Current affairs series that puts a M?ori lens on issues that distinguishes it from other current affairs programmes.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: She Shears
channel.desc: In the gruelling world of competitive sheep shearing there is no women's section. A story of passion, purpose and determination and five women for whom shearing is not just a job. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tapuwae Leave Only Footprints
channel.desc: Pio Terei is on a journey to discover M?ori and Hawaiian indigenous connections through tourism. We visit K?"?anapali Beach Hotel in Maui, Kohutapu Lodge and Tribal Tours in the Bay of plenty. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka Huia
channel.desc: Iconic archival series documenting the unique stories and histories of M?ori. (R).
